Pre/Post Game Callbacks

The methods that are called in the agent implementation (AgentImpl) before/after a TAC game.

gameStarted()

This method is called when a game that this agent should play has started. When this is called, client preferences and auction information have been received from the server.

gameStopped()

This method is called when the current game has finished.
